sentences.english: They raised the pirate flag, with its picture of a skull and crossed bones.
sentences.chinese: 他们升起海盗旗，上面画着骷髅头和交叉的两把刀。

sentences.english: Skeletal Mastery research time reduced to 30 seconds from 45 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 精通招唤骷髅的研发时间从45秒缩减为30秒。

sentences.english: Ben turned his head to look behind him. The skeleton was only a few feet away.
sentences.chinese: 本转过头朝身后看了看，那骷髅离自己只有几英尺了。

sentences.english: The bottle had a skull and crossbones symbol on it.
sentences.chinese: 瓶子上有骷髅和交叉的股骨图形。

sentences.english: Why would Ox want to take the skull there?
sentences.chinese: 为何欧克斯里会想带着骷髅头到那里？

sentences.english: The quiet streets stretched out on either side like the arms of a skeleton.
sentences.chinese: 静静的街道从两旁伸出来，像骷髅伸着枯臂。

sentences.english: If you love Labyrinth games, then Kingdom Skulls is for you.
sentences.chinese: 如果您喜欢迷宫游戏，这款骷髅王国是为你准备的。

sentences.english: So you'll get to wear a little skull on your flight suit.
sentences.chinese: 因此你们将在飞行服上佩戴上一个小骷髅。

sentences.english: The old man was reduced to a skeleton.
Suddenly Ruz came face to face with a human skull!
sentences.chinese: 鲁茨突然发觉自己面对面地站在一个骷髅前。

sentences.english: The building is blown up finally, and skeleton person reduces drop big then.
sentences.chinese: 房屋最终被炸毁，而骷髅人接着大开杀戒。

sentences.english: You can take a firebomb skill make it bounce to hit multiple targets.
sentences.chinese: 你可以让火焰骷髅技能打击到多个目标。

sentences.english: At last they came to a skull-shaped hill outside the city wall.
sentences.chinese: 最后她们来到了城墙外面一座骷髅形状的山顶上。

sentences.english: Some were little more than skeletons.
sentences.chinese: 有一些几乎已经成了骷髅。

sentences.english: They might also be brought to the cemetery for prayers and blessings.
sentences.chinese: 人们还会将这些骷髅头带到墓地去祈祷并祝福。

sentences.english: The Totenkopf's columns of motorized infantry were following up closely behind Rommel's tanks.
sentences.chinese: “骷髅”师的摩托化步兵紧随隆美尔的坦克前进。

definition: human shape/in human form/of human appearance/doll/puppet
